overview: Lilian is engaged to an older man in poor health when she meets his son Michael, whom she falls for. Due to a misunderstanding between the two, Lilian leaves after her fiance's death. Years later, Lilian becomes known around town for her "loose morals," but what happens when she runs into Michael again?
tagline: Men flung away their lives to win her smiles but her love burned true and clean. A romance of Broadway's white lights and a woman's overwhelming love. To prove her love she risked her life to save a little child. A great big vital drama that beats true to the pulse of life.
title: When a Woman Sins
